reviews.review:
Intriguing, epic, and creepy at the right moments

11/10

If you want game which's storyline will make you cry, its this one.
Buy it for all the cost.
This game is strawberry. (It's my jam!)
La Mejor Historia que he Visto en un VideoJuego
Najlepsia hra kto nehral musi zahrat :3

Gioco Fantastico quanto la Grafica. Storia ben studiata e avvincente nel scoprirla avanzando nel gioco; 9/10 Meritati. Dlc sicuramente Ottime. Il gioco non dura molto, una decina di ore o qualcosa di più se lo si vuole vivere appieno, ma non mancherà la voglia di rigiocarlo ancora! Lo Consiglio ;)

Потрясающая игра коих в наше время не так много, сюжет захватывает с первых минут, сразу появляются сюжетные вопросы Кто они? Кто все эти персонажи? Что тут происходит?! И вы не успокоитесь пока не найдете ответы на все эти вопросы! Невероятная атмосфера и отлично проработанные персонажи, простор для экспериментов как с оружием так и с энергетиками, множество загадок которые заставят побегать по всей карте в поисках отмычки или блокнота, превосходная система управления, Концовка же оставлена довольно размытой что позволяет строить догадки как все таки кончилась история, возможно оно и к лучшему.
Что же касается недостатков, то в некоторых местах не много надоедало "гоняться за призраками", но это пожалуй единственный минус. Моя оценка 9/10.
Good game :D
Awesome game! Fav game of 2013
So incredibly racist. However, gameplay is definitely fast, looks awesome and skyhook... just, skyhook.

Un excellent jeu malgré ce que toutes les critiques disent.

Il est vrai que le gameplay laisse peut être à désirer, mais Bioshock c'est une expérience visuelle et vidéo ludique à part.

Главное, что выделяет BioShock Infinite на фоне большинства громких новинок последнего времени, — это удивительная цельность и единство всех элементов игры. Здесь нет ничего лишнего — ни «приклеенной» RPG-составляющей, ни надуманных сюжетных поворотов. Геймплей, сценарий, графика, музыка в синхронном звучании создают поистине потрясающую стимпанковскую атмосферу
Empfehlenswert!

I've played the first two games, and never really got into them, but Infinite was different. I got really into it, totally different feel from the first two. If you didn't like the first two games, give Infinite a try, you might just enjoy it.
Игра хорошая, но на игру года как то не тянет. 8 из 10
love it but not very well optimized for nvidia though
MEGA GAME!!! GET IT NOW!!!
Super Story, Super Spiel!!!
genial mieux que les deux 1er
Игра, как игра, хз где тут какой-то шедевр увидели....единственное, что можно отметить, так это сюжет, в остальном же ничем не зацепила.
Отлично.
Oynayın.
hmm...If i was Metacritic, i would give this game a 10/10:would bang

This game was insanely good.  The combat was it's weakest aspect, but it was still livelier and more entertaining than previous Bioshock games.  The strength was in the appearance, the music, the voicing, the character animation, and above all the story.  I loved every moment of this game.  The ending for me was an emotional experience.  Easily one of the best games I've ever played.

The best shooter of 2013 hands down, the gameplay is amazing and feels great. But the story is simply great, one of the best story's that a game has ever had. A true gem that people need to have. So.... go buy it.
Классная игра! Всем советую!!
A graphically beautiful game, if you have the hardware for it (and cheap during sales), and great gameplay. Do recommend.
The feels have been felt
JUST BUY THIS GAME. Epic story Epic setting

I can absolutely recommend this game. It's a really great mixture of FPS and RPG, it gives you "quests" that don't feel like quests, and there's a ton of loot to be got. The game is absolutely beautiful. I've never played a game that is as immersive. 

You really feel like you want to explore every out-of-the-way corner and dark alley - it definitely rewards exploration, both materially, but also with every little tidbit into the rich and deep storyline. It explores some really deep issues, but is never preachy, it never shys away from the harsh reality of the period, and it also never stereotypes, even when it comes to  the characters that hold extremely abhorrant views. It definitely makes you think.

If I had any complaint, it would be that the NPCs in the world are a bit copypasta, but it doesn't take anything away from this magnum opus of a masterwork. I could go on, but I don't want to ruin anything for anyone who hasn't experienced it yet. If you can play this game, please do yourself a favour and do it!
This is a great game wasnt sure about it for the first 10-15 minutes of play but when it gets going! All i can say is man what a story!
Def my favorite game of 2013.  Probably my favorite game in the last 2-3 years.
Everyone said get it. I did. *HAPPY FACE*

Absolutely gorgeous game. The story and characters captivate you and make for a beautifully designed game. An awesome combat system, there's so many combonations of things you can do in combat. I love it! 10/10 would ride songbird into battle.
Brilliant game, good story and great gameplay
absolutely awesome game
this is an amazing, beautiful experience. reccomend it very much.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UeCX3L8glFk
Simplesmente foda vale cada centavo!

BioShock infinite is perfect the characters are deep and relistice while being exagerations to get there emotions across and the story takes turn's in derections you don't expect they even concet this game to bioshock and system shock that's awsome and Elizabeth is the secound bet female in gameing secound to Ellie from the last of us so in short it diserves it's game of the year award and is one of the best games this generation relised
Awesome game. Couldn't stop playing, once I started. If you are looking for a game wit lots of action, and a fantastic plot, this is the game for you!

Трудно... Сложно...
...было написать эту рецензию, но это должно было случится.
И действительно - очень не просто передать те эмоции, что подарила мне эта игра (которая, к слову, занимает почётное 1ое место в моём ТОПе игр за 2013  год).
С одной стороны - всё понятно - крутейший мир, гениальный сюжет, хотя и топорный FPS. Кен Левин создал то, чего так не хватало игровому мейнстриму - игру, по прохождении которой, приходится думать . Правдивая история: после завершения игры, я, в 3 часа ночи, пошёл на кухню, зажёг свечи и курил сигареты. Одну за одной. Сравнение с американскими горками, что я проводмл ранее и не здесь - слишком мягкое. Тут не просто горки, а горки с Луны до Юпитера в 5D. Пожалуй только так можно описать весь ВОСТОРГ (отсылка, да) после первого посещения Коламбии. И после второго. И после третьего. Да так можно до бесконечности продолжать (недаром подзаголовок такой).
Углубляться в сюжет, на мой взгляд, - не стоит. Дабы не порушить то чувство сказки, которое, непременно, посетит Вас при первом прохождении. А для тех, кто прошёл... Ну Вы и так всё знайте  :)
ТОЛЬКО ЭМОЦИИ, ТОЛЬКО ХАРДКОР, ТОЛЬКО ЭЛИЗАБЕТ.
This game has a great setting at the story is so fantastic I almost cried. play it

Vale muito a pena! Esse jogo tem uma das melhores trilhas sonoras que já ouvi. A historia é muito boa e complexa, envolvendo política, religião, ciência e filosofia. Personagens carismáticos e bem construídos. Tem um visual belo, ambientado nos anos 20 mas ao mesmo tempo futurista. E o final do jogo é surpreendente que lhe fará refletir o jogo inteiro.

An interesting change for Bioshock players that brings a much more exciting adventure in my opinion to the story line. It's a great contrast to the previous Bioshock titles and other than a possible CooP mode for the game, it seems perfect for the situation it was designed for. *SPOILER* Dat ending
Luv it.

After Playing through the main story. I do have to say this really lives up the Bioshock Name.

The story is fantastic. Just like Bioshock 1 it has it own little plot twist that left me speechless. The voxophones that are scattered around the campaign are a good way to get deep within the story and background story also.

Gameplay-wise it was good. The weapon variety could have been a little better. The mouse sensitivity was alittle difficult to get used to. There were some random audio issues and it would randomly load in the middle of a fight for no reason. these small issues were a little frustrating and need to be fixed cause it really takes tehe player out of the mood and feel of the game when these issues are present.

The game is a bit long for my liking but i kind of expected it since it is a Bioshock game.  So i would recommend this to people.  My recommendation is that you play AT LEAST Bioshock 1 first before you play Infinite that way you get a better feel of the connections between the 2 games.

9/10

Super Games! Macht süchtig, schon nach den ersten paar Minuten. Egal ob Grafik oder Gameplay... beides läuft flüssig und auch die Steuerung ist für Einsteiger sehr geeignet, daher mein fundiertes Urteil: TipTop! Kauft es euch, der Preis ist es wert, insbesondere, wenn ihr ein Bioshock-Fan seid ;)
AMAZING
Simplesmente incrível! Simplesmente Bioshock! Enredo muito envolvente, personagens carismáticos, ambiente de altíssima qualidade! Jogaçoooo extremamente recomendado!

I don't like spending money on linear single-player games unless the story rivals that of any book or movie out there.
I'm glad I bought this game. After finishing it, I just sat through the credits because the ending affected me that much.
Muy buen juego, historia muy buena.. lo recomiendo
Schönes Spiel, Interessante Story, leider etwas Inovativlos, jedoch langanhaltender Spielspaß

There's always a man. There's always a city.
Breathtaking pictures and a trully compelling story.
Characters and dialogs which are so much better than Ayn Rand fiction.
Shooting fire from one hand with a shotgun in the other.
Add huge daddy issues on top of that — and yes, you got yourself a Bioshock game.
It is very different from the first game but truly lives up to the title, and the story is worth rethinking and wondering. Then you can take a DLC and return to magnificent Rapture at the brink of its fall — a journey well worth making.

I cannot recommend this game enough.

upd: Note that the Burial at Sea ep. II has some heavy spoilers to the original BioShock.

Few words need to be said other than you must play this game. PC Gamer Game of the Year 2013.

Combat doesn't feel repetitive.
The story engages you.
You develop connections and feelings for the characters (they don't feel stale).
The ending will blow your mind.

11/10

If you're sitting on the fence whether to buy this game or not, let me answer your question for you. Yes. a thousand times yes. It is well worth the money spent. This is a beautiful game and definitely my favorite bioshock. Bringing back the best elements from previous games which make it still bioshock at heart, (i.e. plasmids, fallen paradise, and the general feel of the game) but introducing so many new things which help the game flow perfectly and be new and exciting instead of simply being repetitive like the second bioshock. While Charachter development isnt perfect it is still pretty great. You will feel like Dewitt running around and you will love elizabeth. 

If you have never played the previous bioshocks then you should also definitely buy this game. This game will introduce you to bioshock at its best. you wont be missing a single thing because you havent played the previous bioshocks. there is no plot that will be lost on you and you can familiarize yourself with the gameplay faster than you could in the first bioshock. 

oh yeah. and this game will blow your mind.

Basically this game rocks. You should get it. 9.9 out of 10

Insanely enjoyable.  I could not recommend any other single player game higher than this one.  Bioshock Infinite takes you through an amazingly beautiful and dangerous airborne world on a quest to bring a pair of enigmatic twins a girl.  The following plot twists and delightfully enjoyable gameplay with an ending of pure gold makes this game by far the best one I have ever played.  Never in my life have I played a game that made me think for so long after seeing the final cutscene.  Highly recommended and hope you enjoy it as much as I did!
Купил со скидкой, поиграл и просто погрузился в нее.Советую поиграть, очень понравилась.

Eines der besten Spiele die ich in letzter Zeit gespielt habe. 10/10 
One of the best games i have ever played 10/10
The story is simply amazing! Finally a shooter with a story...
바이오쇼크 말이 필요없는 명작이죠..

first 5 hours (the entire game is 12 hours max long) its good-better-awesomestbestest-ever- and then after that you should absolutely stop playing, uninstall the game and just watch the rest from youtube since the gameplay deteriorates like a zeppelin on fire. Also, about 90% of all powers and guns are just waste of space.

Bioshock Infinite não é só um jogo de tiro em primeira pessoa com fantástica arte e ótima trilha sonora, mas é também um universo minuciosamente construído, com uma história tremendamente bem elaborada e de alta complexidade. Embora guarde algumas ligações com os primeiros jogos, não se trata de uma sequência direta.

A trama novamente aborda temas polêmicos, como religião e política, e desta vez se passa nós céus, em uma cidade voadora chamada Columbia. Você controla o protagonista Booker, que está na cidade para resgatar uma garota em troca do pagamento de suas dívidas. No entanto, sua missão acaba sendo alterada por diversos acontecimentos que culminam no final mais surpreendente de todos os tempos. Felizmente a forma como se dá a exposição dos fatos foi consideravelmente melhorada, o que ajuda bastante a entender os fatos que se passam.

O jogo é visualmente lindo. Os cenários beiram a perfeição, com edifícios, roupas, e até mesmo costumes do moradores fiéis a época. Cada parte da cidade foi muito bem elaborada, com alto nível de detalhamento, além das expressões faciais dos personagens serem bem bonitas. A trilha sonora temática da época também contribui para tornar toda ambientação ainda mais envolvente. No entanto, o jogo perdeu aquele clima macabro dos jogos anteriores, o que não vem a ser um defeito, mas apenas uma mudança.

Os combates estão agora muito mais dinâmicos, e os inimigos além de terem uma inteligência artificial inacreditável, também são muito mais numerosos. Ainda assim, o jogo está mais fácil graças ao escudo regenerativo e a ajuda de Elizabeth. Além disso, achar o caminho certo ficou muito mais fácil, pois além de estarem menos tortuosos, há uma seta verde que auxilia a encontrar a passagem correta. É um bom mecanismo para sabermos qual será o último caminho a ser tomado, já que vale a pena explorar cada canto do mapa.

Em Columbia, também existem situações em que o jogador deve fazer escolhas, mas infelizmente, elas não têm nenhuma importância, e se chegam a mudar alguma coisa, trata-se de algo irrelevante. Pela forma como ocorre o final, é até compreensível que as escolhas não afetem o desfecho, mas ao menos alterações concretas na campanha eram esperadas, e sua falta foi desapontador.

Uma coisa curiosa é que apesar de o jogo estar com legendas em português, não há legendas para a reprodução das gravações encontradas pela cidade, nem mesmo em inglês, o que força o jogador que as quiser ler ir até o menu. Mesmo sendo algo meramente cosmético, não deixa de ser uma coisa negativa.

Em resumo, Bioshock Infinite é uma experiência única. A ambientação é provavelmente a melhor já criada para um jogo, e a história excepcional e de alta complexidade tem um desfecho totalmente inesperado, que certamente irá superar suas expectativas. EXCELENTE (9/10).

I just finished my first playthrough and I have to say that both story and gameplay was a blast.

Definitely a must play!
Одна из лучших игр вообще
Its a great story line game, however the ending is a bit againts its own (Quotes) "Theory".

It's been said by many people already, but it's worth saying again. This game is really, really good. Elizabeth is one of the most realized characters to interact with ever created. From facial expressions, to mannerisms, she makes the game through and through. Not since Dogmeat from the original Fallout have I been so invested in seeing someone else through an entire game. If you like a compelling story with compelling characters, play it. You won't regret it.

Just an excellent game. Takes about 10-20 hours to play and is a great offline game (why I don't have more hours into this).

 The story mixes with the actual game and makes a great combo the fighting is never boring due to the combination of guns and vigors (magic). The combat itself is hard and forgiving because of the fall back to a checkpoint style of death while at the same time keeping with the story which every part of this game does perfectly, there's no meta game moments which brings the world in a beautiful way to you, uninterrupted by gameplay. The game is fresh and unique while at the same time familiar and easy to grasp again.

The story is that of the best I've played for a long time and without giving away spoilers its one you most likely won't get until the game tells you. It gives you the nice twist you (should) expect and it ties it off, yet in a way that allows for another game after this.

=== Complaints:

 Choices don't matter in this game but they still make the world different and... well its related to the story.

 There are no puzzles like I expected... aside from [spoiler]The one in the very beginning regarding bells[/spoiler] and that... that's a joke.

 Easy mode is... nothing normal is easy hard is normal and 1999 (konami code) is hard. by that I honestly mean that hard (normal) makes you use your skills and your guns or else, you can also make it through without any back tracking or grinding for money. Easy you could probably use your melee through the entire game. 1999, is the hard mode you expect, requires precision and sometimes may involve an actual use of vigor combinations along with just about anything else.

 Last is the vigors... they are great and each person has their own favorites, once you find yours you wont stray too far except in some situational use.

=== Warnings/Spoiler free tips:

 If you fancy yourself a seasoned gamer I would recommend entering the konami code at the main menu (where you get an options menu) this will give you a tougher game mode and you don't have to repeat the game in hard / normal / easy. (although I will still play the game on the harder mode so that I can revisit and re analyze the game.)

 Pay attention.

 Collect the voice recorders to uncover the full story.

Story: 10/10 (WoAh, watch out for that twist)
Gameplay: 9/10 (FPS, not very exciting. +Vigors or else it would be 7)
Presentation: 10/10 (Good style)
Soundtrack: 7/10 (Non memorable, a few snipets of pop culture type of music)
Replayability: 5/10 (If you do it will feel like a chore, or that you have been betrayed by the game.)
juegaso, buenas graficas, buena historia
Favorite Game 2013

el joc està molt bé, grans grafics i control, potser l'unic negatiu pera mi es que és massa "consolaire". Però en conjunt et fa passar moments molt epics. 
Una altra cosa negativa és que en els DLC les veus no estan en castellà. A part d'això tota la resta excel·lent. Temps de càrrega molt curts, amb SSD es gairebé instantani, detallets i pijades varies que li donen un plus que altres jocs no assoleixen.

An absolutely brilliant game with amazing visuals. Very immersive story-line and lives up to its franchise name of the BioShock series. Glad they brought it out on Mac.

This game works perfectly fine on a MacBook Air (2013). This is definitely a recommended game for any Mac user.
Much Fun

My first BioShock experience so far. Story starts nicely, and slowly pulls you in. Graphics and general flow are great. Controls (default keybindings) are just a bit off. Also the gear, objectives and vigor menus are not intuitive to use. If you like FPS (at least a bit) and have an opportunity to  snap it on sale for couple of pounds then GET IT! :)

O melhor FPS single-player e um dos melhores jogos que joguei nos últimos anos.
Jogabilidade divertida, gráficos bonitos e história interessante, tudo excelente.
It's alright.
10 hours on my first play through (not all achievements yet).  Tons of fun.  Great game.
Great story, Great gameplay set in a wonderful chaotic world. Highly recommended!

There are three kinds of games I tend to play: Open world sandboxes, strategy games and games with great stories. Unfortunately I cannot conclude this game into the "great story" -category. It's not great. It's something far better.

The game is actually quite short. I took me about nine hours to complete it. However, the way the game establishes the setting, the world and the characters is so damn well made that the game creates and unbreakable immersion in the first few minutes. When I first stepped onto the streets of Columbia, I couldn't take my eyes off it for hours. The scenery is beautiful, the characters feel real and the company of Elizabeth may (and I mean it, may) even put Alyx Vance from the Half-Life series to shame.

It is very hard to mention this game without spoiling anything, so I'm just gonna demand everyone to play it and experience it for themselves. The story will blow your minds. I promise.

EDIT: Two years later. It's still great!

The story line in this game is good, but its not very clear unless you spend time actually trying to go along with it. The graphics are outstanding, the gameplay is fun but can be tricky at times. I will say its very overpriced for the amount of gameplay you get, 8 hours if you just casual play and get stuck at bits (my experience) and probably around 12 if you spend time trying to do extras.

Although at times the story may be hard to follow, the game is immersive and enjoyable nonetheless. It varies distinctly from the original two but in a way that only seems fitting for a game of this caliber. It took me roughly 8-9 hours to complete the whole story but after that the game somewhat lacks replayability as the story mode is the only way to play aside from microtransactions and DLC. All in all, this game offers an experience like no other for the time being and is definitely a title that should be in all fans of the series libraries.

Game expetacular! A continuação está muito melhor que as anteriores. Gráficos excelentes, boa jogabilidade, história envolvente, novos inimigos, ambiente aberto. Bioshock Infinite surpreende!! Os DLC's completam a história do game. Nota 10!!
Magnifico!!!! en todos los sentidos y con un final que sinceramente no me esperaba.... recomendado
Such a beautiful game! :3
Claustrophobic FOV, mediocre gameplay, and a pretentious story. How this game is so overrated is beyond me? 7/10. Buy only if you want a very average game.
This game story will blow your mind! And wait to see what "Burial at Sea" will do with your lasting yet-to-be-blown bits of mind left
just an awesome game! mindblowing story, incredible soundtrack and good graphics. Definitely one of the best Singleplayer games in history!
Lo mejor que se puede hacer con este juego, en vez de publicitarlo, es simplemente no decir nada y que el juego obre su magia. Es increible.
Absolutley. MIND. BLOWING.
einfach kaufen
Awesome game, best BioShock game by far :D!
Bien sympatoche, à acheter cependant en promo.
I do not want to get too much into it, but if you enjoy story driven FPS games, beautiful graphics and having your mind beaten to within an inch of it's life. This is the game for you. :)
Un gioco stupendo, oltre ogni immaginazione. Consigliato a tutti gli amanti del genere!!

The game is simply awesome! 
would defo recommend!
Great game. A bit different from the first two, but I liked it even more. Don't get me wrong, both Rapture and Columbia are great.

Cara, um dos melhores jogos que joguei na final, e o melhor final de jogo de todos os tempos para mim, gráficos bem bonitos, jogabilidade fácil, se você gostou dos primeiros Bioshocks, compra esse que não vai se arrepender.

Mérite une place dans le Hall of Fame du jeux vidéo. Une histoire plus qu'intéressante (comme tous les bioshock d'ailleur) et un univers toujours aussi spendide (je préfère ne pas décrire la tête que j'ai fait une fois arrivé à Columbia :p).
Потому что это игра, ради которой не жалко потратить свое свободное время!!!
